Title: Home
Writer: Craig DiGregorio, Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Michelle Hurd
Plot: Ash, Pablo and Kelly are summoned back to Ash's hometown by Ruby, to form an unusual alliance. Once there, Ash's father and the local pub dwellers give the returning son a chilly reception.
